roleset.name: to come into conflict, be in opposition

example.name: autogen1
example.text: he was prepared to risk a policy conflict with the U.S. over an Egyptian plan to hold direct Israeli-Palestinian talks , which the premier 's Likud bloc opposes
example.arg: over an Egyptian plan to hold direct Israeli-Palestinian talks , which the premier 's Likud bloc opposes

example.name: autogen2
example.text: profound cultural conflicts in American life between the `` smart set , '' whose spokesman was H.L. Mencken , and the religious fundamentalists , whom Mencken derided as benighted primitives
example.arg: between the `` smart set , '' whose spokesman was H.L. Mencken , and the religious fundamentalists , whom Mencken derided as benighted primitives
